comments.body: How expensive is this calculation?  Does this allocate in the hotpath?
I expected to see the identical outcome to before for common types (strings, ints, pointers to either, aliases to primitives, etc)

We have a benchmark here https://github.com/kubernetes/gengo/pull/192#discussion_r520955114.

The Protocol string field is the only field that we are looking to apply this defaulting to for 1.20 and we already have a follow up task to use direct comparisons for primitive types.
